divs: Sighting Details We have witnessed a similar object over the last month and have video that was fuzzy, we have been watching the skies, around 5pm my girlfriend was outside setting up for Halloween when she ran inside and said I think its back! We both grabbed cameras I took approx 50 photos, the object would be a bright glow over the mountain would fade out and reappear seemed to move unlike a normal aircraft. This is the fourth time we have witnessed this object, I have a good night photo and several shots from yesterday as well as a video of this object flying silently over our home. We are both professionals with pilot training and stand to loose our credibility, would like for someone to analyze our pictures and video to explain this object if possible!
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Cottonwood

This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cone, Circle, Cylinder, Fireball, Flash
